div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1501 Tell el Fukhar (anc. Ace), Phoenicia, 1963 Burial: c. 332 B.C. (Kindler) Contents: 25 AR, From excavations Tyre: 1/24-st. (as BMC 23-4, most with dates) Disposition: Tel Aviv (Kadman Mus.) Kindler, Eretz Israel 1967, pp. 318-24 (in Hebrew with English summary p. 79) Kadman, INCJ, hoard 4 Stern, IEJ 1968, pp. 216-7
